name: Mini Vegan and Gluten-Free Pumpkin Pies - Date Sweetened
description: Surprise your Thanksgiving dinner guests with a mini gluten free vegan pumpkin pie for each! An individual dessert that is naturally sweetened with dates, easy to make and perfect for fall-themed dinner parties or the holidays. Oil-free refined sugar free. Makes 4 mini 4.5 inch tart/pie pans
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup oat flour (certified gluten-free if needed)
1.5 teaspoons flaxseed meal  (mixed with 1.5 tablespoons of water)
1 cup pumpkin puree (not pumpkin pie mix)
1/4 cup raw cashews (soaked in hot water for 15 mins, then drained )
9-10  dates (soaked in hot water for 15 mins)
1/4 cup Non dairy milk such as almond, oat or light coconut  (plus 2 tablespoons )

recipeInstructions.text: For the crust : Add the dates to a food processor and process until the dates break down into a soft doughy mixture. Then add in the oat flour, almond flour, salt, and cinnamon, and the flax egg and process until the mixture becomes a crumbly mix.
recipeInstructions.name: For the crust : Add the dates to a food processor and process until the dates break down into a soft doughy mixture. Then add in the oat flour, almond flour, salt, and cinnamon, and the flax egg and process until the mixture becomes a crumbly mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Check by pressing the mixture to see if it sticks to each other or not. If not, then add in a few drops of water or if you are okay with using oil, then add in a few drops of oil and process again until the mixture makes fat crumbs and easily sticks together when pressed.
recipeInstructions.name: Check by pressing the mixture to see if it sticks to each other or not. If not, then add in a few drops of water or if you are okay with using oil, then add in a few drops of oil and process again until the mixture makes fat crumbs and easily sticks together when pressed.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer this mixture to your greased mini tart or pie pans and press well evenly. Then put the pie crust to bake at 350 degrees Fahrenheit(180c)  for 12 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer this mixture to your greased mini tart or pie pans and press well evenly. Then put the pie crust to bake at 350 degrees Fahrenheit(180c)  for 12 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the pumpkin pie filling : Soak the cashews and dates in hot water if you haven't soaked them already for at least 15 minutes. Then drain and add to a blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and process until the cashews and dates are evenly blended up and mixed into the pumpkin puree mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the pumpkin pie filling : Soak the cashews and dates in hot water if you haven't soaked them already for at least 15 minutes. Then drain and add to a blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and process until the cashews and dates are evenly blended up and mixed into the pumpkin puree mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: You can add in a few teaspoons more non-dairy milk if the mixture is not blending well. Taste and adjust sweetness if desired with some cane sugar or 1-2 more dates. The mix will get sweeter on baking, so let it be less sweet.
recipeInstructions.name: You can add in a few teaspoons more non-dairy milk if the mixture is not blending well. Taste and adjust sweetness if desired with some cane sugar or 1-2 more dates. The mix will get sweeter on baking, so let it be less sweet.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the crust from the oven then add  pumpkin pie filling in all of the pies and even it out. Then put them back in the oven to bake.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the crust from the oven then add  pumpkin pie filling in all of the pies and even it out. Then put them back in the oven to bake.

recipeInstructions.text: Check at 25 minutes if the center is set non-jiggly otherwise you can bake for another 5 minutes. Then remove the pans from the oven.
recipeInstructions.name: Check at 25 minutes if the center is set non-jiggly otherwise you can bake for another 5 minutes. Then remove the pans from the oven.

recipeInstructions.text: Let cool completely, chill for atleast an hour and then top with your favorite whipped coconut cream or a vegan vanilla ice cream topping and serve. Store refrigerated for upto 3 days. Or freeze.
recipeInstructions.name: Let cool completely, chill for atleast an hour and then top with your favorite whipped coconut cream or a vegan vanilla ice cream topping and serve. Store refrigerated for upto 3 days. Or freeze.

keywords: date sweetened pumpkin pie, glutenfree pumpkin pie, mini pumpkin pies
